10:39 <+jvdrean> I can't find the documentation about how to add syntaxes to the list of available syntaxes on xwiki.org, do we have some ?  
10:43 <+tmortagne> should probably be on http://rendering.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome but can't find any  
10:43 <vmassol> has quit  
10:44 <+tmortagne> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Configuration#HConfiguringWikiSyntaxesanddefaultSyntax  
10:44 <+tmortagne> found i  
10:44 <+tmortagne> it  
10:44 <+tmortagne> ( jvdrean )  
10:48 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki

10:57 <+jvdrean> tmortagne: I'm asking because a user on cloud would like to use markdown, do we have plans or even a JIRA about being able to enable syntaxes on a per-wiki basis ?  
10:58 <+tmortagne> jvdrean: I guess it's possible by adding a filed in XWikireferences  
10:58 <+tmortagne> since AFAIK it's supposed to use the default configuration  source which first look at XWikiPreferences and then at the end look at xwiki.properties  
10:58 <+tmortagne> like most configuration  
10:59 <+tmortagne> s/filed/field/  
10:59 <polx> has quit  
11:00 <vmassol> jvdrean: note that if you want to enable markdown you need to have a recent versoin since I fixed a critical bug not too long ago  
11:00 <vmassol> this one: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XRENDERING-229  
11:00 <vmassol> so 4.2  
11:01 <vmassol> it's possible to backport it though  
11:03 <+jvdrean> tmortagne: right, the only issue is that the list is set once and for all during the wiki init

13:23 <+sburjan> Hello. I have a question. Looking in multi tenancy mode. And I see this is enabled by default in the XEM distribution. xwiki.virtual=1. My question is, which option is the one to use subdomains to access the wikis instead of accessing them using the same base url ?  
13:25 <+sburjan> I guess it's xwiki.virtual.usepath  
13:33 <+tmortagne> yes it's xwiki.virtual.usepath  
13:33 <+tmortagne> note that domain based always work whatever the mode  
13:34 <+tmortagne> xwiki.virtual.usepath just enabled path based and make it the default when generating an external URL  
13:35 <+tmortagne> sburjan: see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/AccessWiki for reference documentation  
13:54 <+sburjan> tmortagne: I think there is an error on the page. It states that. "By default this mode is disabled. To enable it, go to xwiki.cfg and set xwiki.virtual.usepath to 1.". But this is the default we have now, so by default this mode is enabled. can you configm the mistake ?  
13:54 <vmassol> sburjan: yes it's not up to date, could you update it?  
13:54 <+tmortagne> sburjan: the page is just old  
13:54 <+sburjan> yes, updating.  
13:55 <+tmortagne> we recently made it enabled by default  
13:55 <vmassol> in the past domain was by default and we changed that in XXXXX  
13:55 <vmassol> (checking when that was)  
13:55 <vmassol> (since it needs to be put in the doc)  
13:55 <+sburjan> yes, I remember that.  
13:55 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XEM-204  
13:55 <vmassol> 3.3RC1+  
13:56 <+tmortagne> vmassol: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XEM-204 was the first step actually  
13:56 <+tmortagne> was enabled in XEM only  
13:56 <+tmortagne> not by default in platform  
13:57 <vmassol> indeed  
13:57 <jvdrean> has quit  
13:57 <vmassol> too bad Enygma` didn't link to the other issue for XE ;)  
13:58 <+tmortagne> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7310  
13:58 <vmassol> linking
